hoatChat: ống A: Thiamin  hydroclorid ,Pyridoxin hydroclorid; ống B: Cyanocobalamin
dongGoi: Hộp 10 vỉ x 10 ống  (5 ống A (thiamin hydroclorid+pyridoxin hydroclorid) 1 ml + 5 ống B (cyanocobalamin) 1 ml)
taDuoc: Natri formaldehyd sulfoxylat, Natri acetat, Nipagin (p-hydroxymethyl benzoat), NUdc cåt pha tiém; (jng B: Natri clorid, Natri acetat, Nipagin (p-hydroxymethyl benzoat), Nipasol (p-hydroxypropyl benzoat), Dung dịch acid acetic, Nước cất pha tiêm.
